Text.val: 31.10.2014 SH SCR19286 Cleanup GRID: Added test to skip GRID rows where ADMV_VORTEXENTITYCODE= GRID_ID
16.09.2013 JH SCR18407 Changed selection on CLNT209_CONTRACT_NOTICETYPE <> 7 into GSBU_YESNO (2075) = N
09.07.2013 GB SCR18263 Extended selection with CLNT209_NOTICE_TYPE <> 7
07.02.2012 SH SCR17107 Replaced call of GB500 with new version
06.10.2011 SH SCR16781 Added test CLNT212_REVERSEFACTORING = 'N' to perform step 2/3
08.09.2011 GB SCR16742 Added the Cleanup GRID
15.03.2011 SH SCR16270 Added part 2/3 to add missing CSEC rows

ExpSyntax.val: ISNULL ({0,14}) AND NOT (ISNULL ({0,21})) OR NOT (ISNULL ({0,14})) AND ISNULL ({0,21}) OR {0,14}<>{0,21}

SQL_STMT_U.val: DELETE FROM :1/GRID where not(exists(select * from :1/CLNT where CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID = GRID_ID and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2)) and not(exists(select * from :1/CDEP where CDEP_ING_GRID_ID = GRID_ID and CDEP_ACTUALAMOUNTDEPO <> 0)) and not(exists(select * from :1/CSEC where CSEC_ING_GRID_ID = GRID_ID)) and not(exists(select * from :1/GRCJ where GRCJ_GRID_ID = GRID_ID)) and not(exists(select * from :1/DHIC where DHIC_INFS_CODE = 'G' and DHIC_ID = GRID_ID)) and not(exists(select * from :1/ADMV where ADMV_VORTEXENTITYCODE = GRID_ID))
